Featured-image: CK77-yellow-sheer-beaded-long-prom-evening-dress_p.jpg

Description: A full length satin skirt flows into a sweeping train. The beaded design creates a belted look and adds a design pattern to the bodice. The capped sleeves flow into an open back trimmed with the same bead design.
